Elite Units.name: Sayeret Matkal
Elite Units.description: An elite special forces unit specializing in counter-terrorism, reconnaissance, and intelligence gathering.

Elite Units.name: Shayetet 13
Elite Units.description: The naval commando unit of the IDF, focusing on maritime operations, counter-terrorism, and sabotage.

Elite Units.name: The Shaldag Unit
Elite Units.description: A special forces unit under the Israeli Air Force, conducting deep reconnaissance and air force-related missions.

Elite Units.name: Unit 669
Elite Units.description: The IDF's elite combat search and rescue unit, responsible for extracting wounded soldiers and civilians from combat zones.

Special Forces.name: Alpinist Unit
Special Forces.description: Specializes in mountain warfare and operations in snowy terrains.

Special Forces.name: Oketz Unit
Special Forces.description: The IDF's canine unit, trained for attack, detection, and search and rescue missions.

Special Forces.name: Yahalom Unit
Special Forces.description: An elite combat engineering unit specializing in explosive ordnance disposal, tunnel warfare, and special engineering tasks.

Special Forces.name: Sky Rider Unit
Special Forces.description: Operates tactical unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) for reconnaissance and intelligence gathering.

Commando Units.name: Duvdevan Unit
Commando Units.description: An elite unit specializing in undercover operations, counter-terrorism, and targeted assassinations within urban areas.

Commando Units.name: Maglan Unit
Commando Units.description: Conducts deep reconnaissance and special operations behind enemy lines, often using advanced weaponry and tactics.

Commando Units.name: Egoz Unit
Commando Units.description: Specializes in guerrilla warfare, anti-guerrilla warfare, and complex reconnaissance missions, primarily in northern Israel.

Combat Brigades.name: Golani Brigade
Combat Brigades.description: An infantry brigade known for its toughness and participation in major conflicts since its inception.

Combat Brigades.name: Nahal Brigade
Combat Brigades.description: Combines military service with social and agricultural development, focusing on infantry combat.

Combat Brigades.name: Givati Brigade
Combat Brigades.description: An infantry brigade specializing in urban warfare and operations in the southern regions of Israel.

Combat Brigades.name: Paratroopers Brigade
Combat Brigades.description: An elite airborne infantry brigade trained for parachute operations and rapid deployment.

Combat Brigades.name: Kfir Brigade
Combat Brigades.description: Specializes in counter-terrorism and urban warfare, primarily operating in the West Bank.

Combat Brigades.name: Search And Rescue Brigade
Combat Brigades.description: Focuses on search and rescue operations during both military and civilian emergencies.
